case: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
quoteText:
Ad identifiers are non-permanent, non-personal identifiers such as the Android advertising ID and/or Apple's ID for advertising (the ‘IDFA’), which are uniquely associated with your device.
Similar technologies include tracking pixels within ads.

case: This service is only available to users over a certain age
quoteText:

case: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
quoteText:
If a court finds part of this contract illegal, the rest will continue in force

​

Each of the paragraphs of these terms operates separately. If any court or relevant authority decides that any of them are unlawful, the remaining paragraphs will remain in full force and effect.

case: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
quoteText:
Even if we delay in enforcing this contract, we can still enforce it later.
If we do not insist immediately that you do anything you are required to do under these terms, or if we delay in taking steps against you in respect of your breaking this contract, that will not mean that you do not have to do those things and it will not prevent us taking steps against you at a later date.
